titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to Laban T. Moore
CWG13800

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1865 Telegraphing, State Guards, Printing, Hospital, Office Expenses, Services Rendered; Left Stack

body.p:
No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To Laban T Moore Dr

row.cell: To 1 months Services rendered as agent of the state of Kentucky under Genl Order No 3 issue for the Adjutant Generals office in enlisting troops under the call for ten thousand men for six months

body.p: I Certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.
Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 18 of Jany, 1865, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-Master General of the State of Kentucky, the sum of One hundred Dollars, and -- Cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.
No. 334 ^34^ Abstract B Qr. 186.
Laban T. Moore
Dollars 100 x/100
Paid Jany 18, 1865.
Recruiting
Certificate No 48
